data.title: Fire Blade
data.meta_description: Fire Blade (フレイムソード, lit. Flame Sword, in Soul Edge; フレイムタン, lit. Flame Tongue, in other games) is one of Sophitia's weapons in Soul Edge, Soulcalibur II, Soulcalibur III, Soulcalibur Legends, Soulcalibur IV (as well as Azola's signature weapon in the same game), and Soulcalibur: Broken Destiny...
data.text:
Fire Blade (フレイムソード, lit. Flame Sword, in Soul Edge; フレイムタン, lit. Flame Tongue, in other games) is one of Sophitia's weapons in Soul Edge, Soulcalibur II, Soulcalibur III, Soulcalibur Legends, Soulcalibur IV (as well as Azola's signature weapon in the same game), and Soulcalibur: Broken Destiny; and it is one of Cassandra's weapons in Soulcalibur VI.

Soul Edge[]

Fire Blade (SE/SB) General Information Wielder Sophitia Weapon Type Sword and Shield Statistics Power 8/10 Defense 7/10 Strength 6/10 Other Durability 6/10 Weight 3/10 Innate Abilities Consume energy

"Strong, but heat emitting from the sword drains strength."

— Weapon description, Soul Edge

The Fire Blade can be unlocked by completing Episode 5 of Sophitia's Edge Master mode. While travelling across a desert in central Asia, Sophitia comes across the ruins of an ancient Chinese fortress. As she enters the fortress, Taki attacks the exhausted Sophitia but she was able to repel the ninja, who drops the Fire Blade as she flees.

Soulcalibur II[]

Fire Blade (SCII) General Information Wielder Sophitia Weapon Type Sword and Shield Obtainment For sale in Chapter 6, Chapter 7, Subchapter 4 Price 2,200 Gold Statistics Special Effects • Longer reach than normal. (+25%)

• Higher attack power than normal. (+20%)

• A portion of the damage dealt is reflected back. (15%)

"Long reach and has good offense, but wielder receives damage."

— Description

Weapon Gallery Description: A magic sword that is said to unleash burning heat in response to its wielder's emotion. There are also stories of the sword occasionally bursting into flame, searing the hand of the unfortunate warrior who wielded it.

Soulcalibur III[]

Fire Blade (SCIII) Wielder Sophitia Weapon type Sword and Shield Price 13,400 Gold Special Effect #1 Increase attack power. Special Effect #2 Penetrate your opponent's guard and inflict damage.

Effects Increase attack power. (110%) Penetrate your opponent's guard and inflict damage. (20%)

There are two ways of unlocking Fire Blade: the first is to defeat Sophitia in Tales of Souls (although the chances of obtaining this way are low), and the second is to purchase it from the Weapons Shop. However, it won't actually appear in the Shop's listing until Sophitia herself is unlocked.

Soulcalibur Legends[]

In Soulcalibur Legends, Fire Blade is unlocked by reaching Quartz Warrior rank.

Soulcalibur IV[]

Fire Blade (SCIV) Wielder Sophitia, Azola Weapon type Sword and Shield Price 8,000 Gold Attack 160 Defense 60 HP 30 Power 30 Impact 30 Boost 30 Gauge 30 Special 30 Native skill None

It can be bought in Character Creation for 8,000 Gold after completing Story Mode with Sophitia.

Soulcalibur Broken Destiny[]

Fire Blade appears as one of Sophitia's weapons in Soulcalibur Broken Destiny. It is already unlocked at the start of the game.

Soulcalibur VI[]

Description: A mysterious sword that grows hotter the more enraged its wielder gets, allowing for strikes that sear the opponent's flesh. Lesser warriors have mentioned burning their hands after becoming overly agitated. If these claims are true, it would be best to avoid using this sword if you are an assassin or fighting on behalf of another.
